summary: A new look for Talen-Jei's special recipes Velvet LeChance, White Gold Tower and Cliff Racer.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b][color=Green]If you use Realistic Needs and Diseases you must place Riften Specials AFTER the RND mod in load order.[/color][/b][/size]

A new look for Talen-Jei's special recipes Velvet LeChance, White Gold Tower and Cliff Racer.

If you like this file you may also like:
Surile and Argonian Wine Recolor
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/41752/?

Details
=======
For those of you who, like me, were disappointed with the Riften drinks. Yes, I know these are Talen-Jei's own recipes. He brought them over here from his days as a bartender in Gideon. However, I love my wine bottle collection and was excited to add these new drinks. Only to be let down by the generic flagons. Well no more.... And a little something extra for all of those who have ever posed the question: Mead, mead, mead...would it kill em to get some beer every once in a while? Also, added some attributes that makes these drinks worth tucking away in the backpack for those long journeys. ;-) Hope you enjoy!

Location
========
Velvet LeChance, Cliff Racer and White Gold Tower are found at the Bee and Barb in Riften. The beer can be found randomly with merchants and found in treasure chests.

Install
=======

Allow NMM to install. (recommended)

-or-

Unpack and drop the Riften Special .ESP and .BSA files into your SkyrimData folder.

Uninstall
=========

Use NMM to uninstall...again...recommended.

-or-

Remove the Riften Special .ESP and .BSA files from your SkyrimData folder.


History
=======

1.0, 2013/09/03 - Initial release.
